Name: Tunis
Description: Tunis is the capital and largest city of Tunisia, located on the Mediterranean coast. It is the country s political, economic, and cultural center.

Name: Sfax
Description: Sfax is Tunisia s second-largest city and a major economic hub, particularly known for its port and its role in the olive oil industry.

Name: Sousse
Description: Sousse is a coastal city in Tunisia, known for its historic medina, beaches, and as a popular tourist destination.
